start: ^Hey Eric, it's going well! Been a busy morning so far, I think there's a conference happening next door.

c-0: ^Good to hear! It seems pretty packed in here today.
c-1: ^You're in a good spot for it though-- there's free coffee whenever you need it!
g-0: ^It's crazy how many businessmen from my company are here right now...I feel kinda intimidated. I wonder if they know I intern for their company.
^You should introduce yourself to some of them! Hopefully this internship could get you a permanent spot at the company.
^That's fair, it can be hard to get noticed in a big company.

c-2: ^You're right...who knows who I might meet. Maybe there are some managers here...
c-3: ^Yeah, there's a lot of people competing for permanent positions.

g-1: ^I don't know how these guys seem interested in this company. Who wants to spend all their time working for a car insurance business.
^What type of business would you wanna work for?
^I guess it just pays the bills.

c-4: ^I'm not sure...I don't mind the work I'm doing, but I wanna work for someone who's passionate about what their company does.

g-2: ^If I'm being honest, I don't think I wanna work for this company when my internship is over. I wanna work for a business that's doing something cool, or new.
^That's okay! You're learning so much right now that will help you when you look for a job you really want.
^Fair enough, from the look of these guys the company doesn't seem too interesting.

c-6: ^You're right. Once I graduate I can expand my horizons.

g-3: ^Thanks again for the coffee--I can't get enough of it, it's so flavorful!
^It makes me so happy you like it as much as I do! See you soon.
